title: Preferred online retail payment methods worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of online shoppers for 9 number of Payment Methods.
The Share of online shoppers is appeared to be the highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
The maximum Payment Method Credit cards has got 14.0 times higher Share of online shoppers than the minimum Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Payment Method in the x axis and Share of online shoppers in the y axis.
The Share of online shoppers is appeared to be the highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of online shoppers for 9 number of Payment Methods.
The Share of online shoppers is appeared to be the highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
The maximum Payment Method Credit cards has got 14.0 times higher Share of online shoppers than the minimum Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of online shoppers for 9 number of Payment Methods.
The Share of online shoppers is appeared to be the highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
Second maximum Share of online shoppers is found at Payment Method Electronic payment (PayPal if available).
The highest Payment Method Credit cards has 39.0 more Share of online shoppers than the lowest Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).

The Payment Method Credit cards has the highest Share of online shoppers, followed by Electronic payment (PayPal if available), and Debit cards. Down to the Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) which is the lowest.
Similar Share of online shoppers is found in Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin), and Other.
Considered together, the average Share of online shoppers in all 9 Payment Methods is roughly 20.78.
